about_the_game:
Rebellion Soundtrack

The musical tracks contain the music created for the Rebellion Game.

The soundtrack includes:

The opening Rebellion soundtrack
The exploration Sneaking Around soundtrack
The Dreams tutorial and credits soundtrack
A few short music clips of TV Drama, TA DA and News
The boombox Dance soundtrack
The guard chasing Tension and Doomed soundtracks
The administrative building Admin Building soundtrack
The original Endgame soundtrack
High suspicion Sneaking Around, Tension and Doomed soundtracks
The Rebellion with Intro soundtrack

name: Rebellion Soundtrack
short_description: Soundtrack of the game Rebellion!: A puzzle-RPG with a humorous take on the government's overreach in 2020. Explore the subdivision Collect Keys, pens and paper Observe residents Write and deliver letters to build support. Launch a Rebellion!
